name: Reveal (itch)
description:
Embark on a journey to discover who you are and unfold the events of your past through a 3D exploration game that features 2D mini-games of discovery.

Here's a glimpse of the gameplay experience with a few playtesters trying out the demo!



MEET THE TEAM!


HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

Press the 'download' button below > When finished downloading, unzip the folder > Open the 'Reveal' file > Pick your desired settings > Play and enjoy!
